item.title: Getting started
item.description: Install Visual Studio or Visual Studio for Mac and enable both Xamarin and .NET Core support, these are listed as ‘Mobile development with .NET’ and ‘.NET Core Cross-platform development’ respectively. Open a command prompt window and install the template pack by entering: dotnet new -i Fabulous.XamarinForms.Templates Navigate to a folder in the command prompt window where your new app can be created and enter: dotnet new fabulous-xf-app -n SqueakyApp Open, edit and build in Visual Studio or Visual Studio for Mac SqueakyApp/SqueakyApp.
